name: eles.renderedBoundingBox
descr: Get the [rendered](#notation/position) bounding box of the elements.

formats.name: eles.renderedBoundingBox
formats.descr: Get the bounding box of the elements in rendered co-ordinates.

args.name: options
args.descr: An object containing options for the function.

fields.name: includeNodes
fields.descr: A boolean indicating whether to include nodes in the bounding box (default `true`).

fields.name: includeEdges
fields.descr: A boolean indicating whether to include edges in the bounding box (default `true`).

fields.name: includeLabels
fields.descr: A boolean indicating whether to include labels overall in the bounding box (default `true`).  This option overrides all other label options if `false`.

fields.name: includeMainLabels
fields.descr: A boolean indicating whether to include main (node or edge) `label`s in the bounding box (default `true`).

fields.name: includeSourceLabels
fields.descr: A boolean indicating whether to include (edge) `source-label`s in the bounding box (default `true`).

fields.name: includeTargetLabels
fields.descr: A boolean indicating whether to include (edge) `target-label`s in the bounding box (default `true`).

fields.name: includeOverlays
fields.descr: A boolean indicating whether to include overlays (such as the one which appears when a node is clicked) in the bounding box (default `true`).
